/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars of different colors are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in bright sunlight, casting sharp shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
